metadata.title: CVE-2016-15003 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in FileZilla Client 3.17.0.0 and classifiedas problematic. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the fileC:\Program Files\FileZilla FTP Client\uninstall.exe of the componentInstaller. The manipulation leads to unquoted search path. The attack canbe initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and maybe used.

criterions.comment: filezilla: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
